about.title: About Oqoltin Ta'mir
about.body: Oqoltin Ta'mir LLC is a company with extensive experience that has been successfully operating in the Uzbekistan market since 2009, specializing in construction, technical services, and energy sectors.
about.founder: Our company founder is a specialist with 40 years of engineering and management experience, and since its inception, the company has been steadily developing and successfully implementing many major projects.
activities: Irrigation and land reclamation systems development
High-voltage electrical networks and energy equipment construction
about.licenses: We have special licenses and relevant certificates for the construction of electrical networks and facilities, which confirms our full legal and technical competence in this field.
